La Rambla, Barcelona, in 2011
  • A knife attack in Turku, Finland, kills twa fowk an injures ten ithers.
  • Three separate attacks in Catalonia, Spain, (ane location picturt) kill at least fifteen fowk an injure mair nor ane hunder ithers.
  • The Hong Kong Coort o Appeal sentences three prominent pro-democracy activists tae jyle.
  • At least fower hunder fowk are killed bi mudslides in an aroond Freetown, Sierra Leone.
  • In gowf, Justin Thomas wins the PGA Championship.
